title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, admin, RAG, multi-user); drop-in replacement for ChatGPT-UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/manage models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper (Go) that adds progress bars, coloured logs and batch operations.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-style code-completion engine for VS Code.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and chat over documents.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host a Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama client with retries, health checks and metrics.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-rails
summary: Ruby gem that wraps Ollama for Rails apps: ActiveRecord embeddings, chat controllers, background jobs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels with thread support and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that connects to Ollama with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault for summarizing notes or Q&A.
